{{drawgraph:

target.1 =
    function:mean,
    value:value,
    series:network.packets.rx|m,
    groupby:gid nid nic,
    condition:gid={gid} AND nid={id} type=physical,
    alias:rx $tag_nic,
    interval:1m,

target.2 =
    function:mean,
    value:value,
    series:network.packets.tx|m,
    groupby:gid nid nic,
    condition:gid={gid} AND nid={id} type=physical,
    alias:tx $tag_nic,
    interval:1m,

cfg.title = 'Packet sent/recv'
cfg.dashboardtitle = 'Node {nodename} ({gid}:{id}) packet'
cfg.height = 275px
cfg.width = 500px
cfg.stack = true
cfg.fill = 3
cfg.y_format = pps

}}
